fields.description: This QIIME 2 plugin provides functionality for working with and visualizing Metadata.
fields.name: metadata
fields.short_summary: Plugin for working with Metadata.

fields.description: This QIIME 2 plugin supports methods for compositional data analysis.
fields.name: composition
fields.short_summary: Plugin for compositional data analysis.

fields.description: This QIIME 2 plugin wraps DADA2 and supports sequence quality control for single-end and paired-end reads using the DADA2 R library.
fields.name: dada2
fields.short_summary: Plugin for sequence quality control with DADA2.

fields.description: This QIIME 2 plugin supports methods for analysis of time series analysis, involving either paired sample comparisons or longitudinal study designs.
fields.name: longitudinal
fields.short_summary: Plugin for paired sample and time series analyses.

fields.description: This QIIME 2 plugin supports demultiplexing of single-end and paired-end sequence reads and visualization of sequence quality information.
fields.name: demux
fields.short_summary: Plugin for demultiplexing & viewing sequence quality.

fields.description: This QIIME 2 plugin wraps the Deblur software for performing sequence quality control.
fields.name: deblur
fields.short_summary: Plugin for sequence quality control with Deblur.

fields.description: This is a QIIME 2 plugin supporting operations on sample by feature tables, such as filtering, merging, and transforming tables.
fields.name: feature-table
fields.short_summary: Plugin for working with sample by feature tables.

fields.description: This QIIME 2 plugin defines semantic types and transformers supporting microbiome analysis.
fields.name: types
fields.short_summary: Plugin defining types for microbiome analysis.

fields.description: This plugin wraps the vsearch application, and provides methods for clustering and dereplicating features and sequences.
fields.name: vsearch
fields.short_summary: Plugin for clustering and dereplicating with vsearch.

fields.description: This QIIME 2 plugin provides support for generating and manipulating sequence alignments.
fields.name: alignment
fields.short_summary: Plugin for generating and manipulating alignments.

fields.description: This QIIME 2 plugin provides functionality for working with and visualizing taxonomic annotations of features.
fields.name: taxa
fields.short_summary: Plugin for working with feature taxonomy annotations.

fields.description: This QIIME 2 plugin uses cutadapt to work with adapters (e.g. barcodes, primers) in sequence data.
fields.name: cutadapt
fields.short_summary: Plugin for removing adapter sequences, primers, and other unwanted sequence from sequence data.

fields.description: This QIIME 2 plugin supports metrics for calculating and exploring community alpha and beta diversity through statistics and visualizations in the context of sample metadata.
fields.name: diversity
fields.short_summary: Plugin for exploring community diversity.

fields.description: This QIIME 2 plugin supports methods for assessing and controlling the quality of feature and sequence data.
fields.name: quality-control
fields.short_summary: Plugin for quality control of feature and sequence data.

fields.description: This QIIME 2 plugin supports taxonomic classification of features using a variety of methods, including Naive Bayes, vsearch, and BLAST+.
fields.name: feature-classifier
fields.short_summary: Plugin for taxonomic classification.

fields.description: This QIIME 2 plugin supports methods for supervised classification and regression of sample metadata, and other supervised machine learning methods.
fields.name: sample-classifier
fields.short_summary: Plugin for machine learning prediction of sample metadata.

fields.description: This is a QIIME 2 plugin supporting statistical models on feature tables and metadata using balances.
fields.name: gneiss
fields.short_summary: Plugin for building compositional models.

fields.description: This QIIME 2 plugin wraps Emperor and supports interactive visualization of ordination plots.
fields.name: emperor
fields.short_summary: Plugin for ordination plotting with Emperor.

fields.description: This QIIME 2 plugin supports filtering and trimming of sequence reads based on PHRED scores and ambiguous nucleotide characters.
fields.name: quality-filter
fields.short_summary: Plugin for PHRED-based filtering and trimming.

fields.description: This QIIME 2 plugin supports generating and manipulating phylogenetic trees.
fields.name: phylogeny
fields.short_summary: Plugin for generating and manipulating phylogenies.
